name: Postcards from Alarillos
description:
Lucedon Anterior and Lucedon Exterior. Twin jewels of the continent, separated by the desert Alarillos, but governed hand-in-hand.

On a day when the sun's light shone particularly generously onto the land below, almost like a blessing for the days to come, 

a member of the de Guzman house was summoned to the side of their soon-to-be-married Kapitan.

Your best friend is about to get married, and you travel across a vast desert in order to deliver his brother to the venue in time.

This short demo includes:

  • The first area of the game
  • Two characters you may journey with later on
  • Window shopping

Please check back soon for updates and more info!
